Utilities (``admet.util``)
==========================

The ``admet.util`` package provides common utilities and helper functions
used throughout the ADMET package.

.. automodule:: admet.util
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :noindex:

Modules
-------

logging
^^^^^^^

Logging configuration and setup utilities.

.. automodule:: admet.util.logging
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

utils
^^^^^

General utility functions.

.. automodule:: admet.util.utils
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

**Key Functions:**

- ``parse_data_dir_params()``: Extract metadata from data directory paths
